Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO ENVIRONMENTAL CONSERVATION

Title: Relates to bioheating fuel requirements
Summary: Relates to bioheating fuel requirements and bioheating fuel tax credits; requires all heating oil sold for use in any building in the state on and after July 1, 2022 be bioheating fuel that contains a minimum percent biodiesel or renewable hydrocarbon diesel.
LawCode: Amd ยง19-0327, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to bioheating fuel requirements
